title: Principles of Marketing 15th Global Edition c2014 Kotler txtbk
description:
Principles of Marketing, 15th Global Edition (c2014), textbook by Philip Kotler & Gary Armstrong.

TEXTBOOK INFO:
Global edition: <a href=" http://catalogue.pearsoned.co.uk/catalog/academic/product?ISBN=9780273786993" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://catalogue.pearsoned.co.uk/catalog/academic/product?ISBN=9780273786993</a>
National edition: <a href=" http://www.pearsonhighered.com/pearsonhigheredus/educator/product/products_detail.page?isbn=9780133084047" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.pearsonhighered.com/pearsonhigheredus/educator/product/products_detail.page?isbn=9780133084047</a>
Both editions have the same table of contents and page count but it couldn't be ascertained if contents are actually the same.

CONTENTS:
Part I  Defining Marketing and the Marketing Process
  1. Marketing: Creating and Capturing Customer Value
  2. Company and Marketing Strategy: Partnering to Build Customer Relationships
Part II  Understanding the Marketplace and Consumers
  3. Analyzing the Marketing Environment
  4. Managing Marketing Information to Gain Customer Insights
  5. Consumer Markets and Consumer Buyer Behavior
  6. Business Markets and Business Buyer Behavior
Part III  Designing a Customer-Driven Strategy and Mix
  7. Consumer-Driven Marketing Strategy
  8. Products, Services, and Brands: Building Customer Value
  9. New Product Development and Product Life-Cycle Strategies
  10. Pricing: Understanding and Capturing Customer Value
  11. Pricing Strategies
  12. Marketing Channels: Delivering Customer Value
  13. Retailing and Wholesaling
  14. Communicating Customer Value: Integrated Marketing Communications Strategy
  15. Advertising and Public Relations
  16. Personal Selling and Sales Promotion
  17. Direct and Online Marketing: Building Direct Customer Relationships
Part IV  Extending Marketing
  18. Creating Competitive Advantage
  19. The Global Marketplace
  20. Sustainable Marketing: Social Responsibility and Ethics


FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF (35 MB).
compressed (zipped): *right-click* the filename (.7z) & choose *Extract* to convert to PDF; discard the .7z file (container) when done with seeding.
